feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: Clippers and Kawhi Leonard Break the Rules, NBA Free Agency Near Its End, and NBA Over/Under Predictions for the 25-26 Season - Season 4 Episode 19”

link.title: Clippers and Kawhi Leonard Break the Rules, NBA Free Agency Near Its End, and NBA Over/Under Predictions for the 25-26 Season - Season 4 Episode 19”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss the ongoing investigation of the Clippers and Kawhi Leonard. The guys also discuss the final moves being made in free agency. Lastly they give their predictions on whether each team will hit or miss their projected win totals from BetMGM.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: NBA Offseason Continues, Extension Talk Restricted Free Agency Taking Forever, and Brand New Agreement to Disagree Segment - Season 4 Episode 18”

link.title: NBA Offseason Continues, Extension Talk Restricted Free Agency Taking Forever, and Brand New Agreement to Disagree Segment - Season 4 Episode 18”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss more news happening during NBA free agency. The guys go over contract extensions of Luka Doncic, Mikal Bridges, and DeAron Fox. They also talk about why restricted free agency is taking so long. Lastly they have a brand segment where they talk about the biggest question for every team going into the new season.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: 2025 Finals Review, Blockbuster Trades, Knicks Coaching Search Continues, Lakers Owners Sell the Team, and Draft Preview - Season 4 Episode 16”

link.title: 2025 Finals Review, Blockbuster Trades, Knicks Coaching Search Continues, Lakers Owners Sell the Team, and Draft Preview - Season 4 Episode 16”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss everything that happened during the NBA Finals. The guys also discuss the Knicks head coaching search, go over some big trades made this past week and talk about the Lakers recent sale. Finally the guys preview the 2025 NBA draft.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. entry.title: Conference Final Review, NBA Finals Preview, and Questionable Coaching Change Coming - Season 4 Episode 15”

link.title: Conference Final Review, NBA Finals Preview, and Questionable Coaching Change Coming - Season 4 Episode 15”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss everything that happened in both conference finals as well as preview the NBA Finals. Lastly the guys discuss the Knicks decision to move on from Coach Tom Thibodeau.

entry.title: NBA Playoffs Round 1 Recap and Semi Finals Round Preview, Are Top Teams in the Eastern Conference Making Changes For Next Season? - Season 4 Episode 12”

link.title: NBA Playoffs Round 1 Recap and Semi Finals Round Preview, Are Top Teams in the Eastern Conference Making Changes For Next Season? - Season 4 Episode 12”

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss the first round of the NBA Playoffs plus preview some of the second round matchups. Lastly the guys discuss if two top teams in the eastern conference are going to make significant roster changes come next season.

entry.title: Luka Returns to Dallas, Malone out of Denver, and Award Predictions - Season 4 Episode 10”

link.title: Luka Returns to Dallas, Malone out of Denver, and Award Predictions - Season 4 Episode 10”

entry.content:
Jack and Noah are back! This episode they discuss Luka Doncic returning to Dallas since being traded to LA. The guys also discuss the shocking firing of Nuggets Head Coach Mike Malone. Lastly they give all NBA and award predictions as the playoffs near.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!
